title: Cryptomultiplier
author: Cryptomultiplier
content: It's no longer serious news about Mark Zuckerberg's Meta launching the Ai powered Ray-Ban glasses for pictures and videos capturing, all in a bid to relive the experience that may soon be forgotten. It's a good initiative I must say and it is inline with the future of AI domination.What do you think of this new tech?Link:https://www.instagram.com/reel/CyMIKAeN_qX/?igshid=NjZiM2M3MzIxNA==

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on October 09, 2023, 07:51:36 PMIt's no longer serious news about Mark Zuckerberg's Meta launching the Ai powered Ray-Ban glasses for pictures and videos capturing, all in a bid to relive the experience that may soon be forgotten. It's a good initiative I must say and it is inline with the future of AI domination.What do you think of this new tech?Link:https://www.instagram.com/reel/CyMIKAeN_qX/?igshid=NjZiM2M3MzIxNA==First and first, I am not a fan of Ray-Ban, and it is a branded eyewear, which is one of the most expensive glasses. Another point is that we are extremely into innovation these days, and we can't seem to stop it. What we truly need to do is incorporate it into our daily lives. Why not if it helps?So what Mark did is significant for the Ray-ban firm, because we know that in addition to Ray-ban being well-known all over the globe, Mark Z is also a well-known person, so people all around the world will most likely continue to protect it.
